story.text:
YOUTUBE USf1zRaDyH4
MacArthur Park
Brass In Concert 2008 at The Sage, Gateshead Grimethorpe Colliery Band DVD -- www.worldofbrass.com

YOUTUBE tjpAM5YWeQU
The Grimethorpe Colliery Band is a brass band, based in Grimethorpe, South Yorkshire, England. It was formed in 1917, as a leisure activity for the workers at the colliery, by members of the disbanded Cudworth Colliery Band. The band has 28 players

YOUTUBE bzvIcif6JGQ
This is a favourite piece both to listen to & play. Not the most technically taxing, but the stamina required to carry the piece off is absolutely immense. Just listen to the first 3 minutes, its NEVER off the face. Coupled with the tuning and intonation, its still a severe test of ANY band to get it right. Well played﻿
